SharedPrivateLinkResource.description: Concrete proxy resource types can be created by aliasing this type using a specific property type.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

SharedPrivateLinkResourceListResult.description: The response of a SharedPrivateLinkResource list operation.

value.description: The SharedPrivateLinkResource items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

SharedPrivateLinkResourceProperties.description: The generic properties of a Shared Private Link resource.

privateLinkResourceId.description: The resource id of the resource the shared private link resource is for.

groupId.description: The group id from the provider of resource the shared private link resource is for.

requestMessage.description: The request message for requesting approval of the shared private link resource.

dnsZone.description: The DNS zone to be included in the DNS name of the shared private link. Value is service-specific.

status.description: Status of the shared private link resource. Can be Pending, Approved, Rejected or Disconnected.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the resource.

SharedPrivateLinkResourceStatus.description: Status of the shared private link resource. Can be Pending, Approved, Rejected or Disconnected.

values.name: Pending
values.description: The shared private link connection request was not yet authorized by the resource owner.

values.name: Approved
values.description: The shared private link connection request was approved by the resource owner.

values.name: Rejected
values.description: The shared private link connection request was rejected by the resource owner.

values.name: Disconnected
values.description: The shared private link connection request was disconnected by the resource owner.

readIntent.description: Set to true to monitor a high availability replica of specified target, if any.

readIntent.description: Set to true to monitor a high availability replica of specified target, if any.

values.description: The SQL password authentication.

value.description: The Target items on this page

targetAuthenticationType.description: The type of authentication to use when connecting to a target.

targetVault.description: To use SQL authentication when connecting to targets, specify the vault where the login name and password secrets are stored.

connectionServerName.description: The server name to use in the connection string when connecting to a target. Port number and instance name must be specified separately.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the resource.

VaultSecret.description: The vault specific details required if using SQL authentication to connect to a target.

akvResourceId.description: The Azure ResourceId of the Key Vault instance storing database authentication secrets.

akvTargetUser.description: The path to the Key Vault secret storing the login name (aka user name, aka account name) for authentication to a target.

akvTargetPassword.description: The path to the Key Vault secret storing the password for authentication to a target.

values.name: Starting
values.description: Denotes the watcher is in a starting state.

values.name: Running
values.description: Denotes the watcher is in a running state.

values.name: Stopping
values.description: Denotes the watcher is in a stopping state.
